      • discardAndDraw

        public void discardAndDraw​(Board board,
                           int index)
        Discards the card from the player's hand. Add this card to the discard deck.
        Parameters:
        board - Hanabi.Board where the game is played on
        index - Index of the card to be discarded, chosen by the player

      • playAndDraw

        public void playAndDraw​(Board board,
                        int index,
                        java.lang.String colorStr)
        Put the card on game if allowed and draw a card from the deck
        Parameters:
        board - Hanabi.Board where the game is played on
        index - Index of the card to be discarded, chosen by the player
        colorStr - Hanabi.Player's input
